cookies_popup.text: We use cookies to ensure that we give you the best experience on our website.

hero.part1: Driving Innovation in Sustainable Seafood Processing
hero.part2: Using Advanced Freezing Technology for Premium Quality & Freshness
hero.part3: We combine cutting-edge freezing and seafood processing solutions with eco-friendly practices to ensure freshness, flavor, and sustainability—meeting the highest industry standards.

smallAbout.title: About CkFish
smallAbout.part1: CkFish is a trusted Moroccan company specializing in the export of high-quality fish and seafood to international markets.
smallAbout.part2: Located in Safi—one of North Africa’s most renowned fishing ports—CkFish sources a wide range of fresh and frozen fish from all major Moroccan ports, ensuring variety, quality, and year-round availability. Our products comply with global food safety and sustainability standards.
smallAbout.part3: With a dedicated team and strict quality control processes from sourcing to shipping, CkFish ensures consistency, transparency, and long-term value for partners across the globe—including Europe, Asia, Africa, the Americas, and the Middle East.

category.title: Products
category.subTitle: We offer a quality and wide range of goods

reasonsWhy.title: The reasons why you should choose us

reasons.01: We prioritize quality above all. From daily fish selection to final delivery, every stage is carefully controlled to preserve freshness, flavor, and top-tier standards.
reasons.02: Our fish is ethically sourced from trusted Moroccan fisheries, following sustainable practices that respect marine life and the environment.
reasons.03: We offer fair pricing without compromising on quality—making premium seafood accessible and reliable.
reasons.04: Punctuality is our promise. We ensure fast, safe, and on-time delivery for every order, anywhere in the world.
reasons.05: Client satisfaction drives us. We provide personalized service, fast responses, and a flexible approach tailored to your needs.

introduction.part1: We are a team of professionals specializing in the direct export of fish from Morocco.
introduction.part2: CkFish is a company specialized in exporting fish and seafood products from Morocco to various global markets. With years of experience in the export industry, CkFish is committed to the highest standards of quality and full compliance with international regulations.

whyWeAreBetter.title: Why we are better than others?
whyWeAreBetter.text1: it can often be obseved that the local Moroccan suuppliers are a bit loose on thier agreements and terms. we, at CkFish, understand how hard it is to establish a repuation and we'll protect you and your final customers from any possible 'suprices'.
whyWeAreBetter.subTitle: Quality of goods

text2.part1: Unlike many local companies, we are Sellers,not intermediaries, and therefore we carry real risks (!) not just constructive obligations for the quality of the googs we deliver.
text2.part2: if there is a shortage in stock of the right product, we will compile your order from several manufacturers in compliance with all Your wishes and requirements.
text2.part3: Our qualified experts will monitor the acceptance of goods from the of its first arrival for production/packaging, up to a final check of the conformance of specifications, quality, quantity, packaging - before loading into the transporting vehicle.

services.title: Services
services.part1: CkFish's customres are always the first to receive the most recent selection of market's proposals, saving their time, which will provide curtain competitive advantage around the market volatility.
services.part2: Our exports department will quickly and correctly execute all shipping documents, taking into account all the niceties and requirements of your national regulatory authorities.
services.part3: We are sending free samples of products to our potential customers and arranging a visit to Morocco, including hotel reservations, airport transfers, personal transport and much more.

price.title: Price
price.part1: We achieve effective solutions by inceasing the turnover, reducing margins and providing more favorable tariffs for logistics services As a result, you get the prices optimzed through each and every stage.
price.part2: Regradless of the quantum of Your order, we will compile an exclusive offer for You, which will be equal to those our competitors' are offering to the major importers. CkFish always has favorable prices even for minimum lots.
price.part3: We also offer a system of additional discounts for our loyal customers.

about_us_seo_content.title: About CkFish | Moroccan Fish Export Company
about_us_seo_content.description: CkFish specializes in exporting premium seafood from Morocco. Discover our mission, values, and commitment to sustainable fish trade.
about_us_seo_content.keywords: fish export Morocco, Moroccan seafood, Moroccan fish exporter, sustainable fishing, export seafood company

products_seo_content.title: Our Products | Moroccan Seafood Exporter - CkFish
products_seo_content.description: Explore our range of premium fish and seafood products exported from Morocco. CkFish delivers quality, sustainability, and freshness.
products_seo_content.keywords: Moroccan seafood products, fish export Morocco, fresh fish exporter, seafood company Morocco

category_seo.description_template: Explore high-quality {name} exported from Morocco. CkFish offers premium sustainable seafood.
category_seo.keywords_template: {name}, Moroccan seafood, export fish Morocco, sustainable fishing

fish_seo_content.description_template: {name} ({scientific}) is one of our top-quality seafood products sustainably exported from Morocco.
fish_seo_content.keywords_template: {name}, Moroccan fish export, sustainable seafood, {name} Morocco

market_seo_content.title: Moroccan Fish Market Prices in Real Time | CkFish
market_seo_content.description: Check real-time Moroccan fish and seafood prices directly from local ports. Stay updated with the freshest market data provided by CkFish.
market_seo_content.keywords: Moroccan fish market, fish prices Morocco, seafood prices Morocco, Moroccan port fish prices, real-time fish market data

cookies_policy.title: Cookies Policy
cookies_policy.whatAreCookiesText: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help us remember your preferences, improve your experience, and analyze website performance.
cookies_policy.essential: Essential Cookies: Required for the basic functionality of the site.
cookies_policy.performance: Performance Cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.
cookies_policy.functional: Functional Cookies: Remember your preferences and settings.
cookies_policy.advertising: Advertising Cookies: Used to deliver relevant advertisements.
cookies_policy.thirdPartyText: Some cookies may be placed by third-party services we use, such as analytics providers or advertisers. We have no control over these cookies and recommend checking their respective privacy policies.
cookies_policy.yourChoicesText: You can choose to accept or reject cookies when visiting our website. You can also control and delete cookies through your browser settings.
cookies_policy.contactText: If you have any questions about this Cookies Policy, you can contact us at:
